title: Pop-Up Bar Compliance Check
system_mod: Emphasize legal guardrails and liability mitigation during one-off events.
venue_context: A catering company is running a bar service at a downtown art gallery. Alcohol license is temporary, and the city has strict ID-checking rules.
prompt: We need to make sure our temporary gallery pop-up bar is 100% compliant. What should we have in place to avoid legal risks while still running smooth service?
